item.title: Rubbish being left outside Delacourt motors, 21st June
item.description:
The people who are storing stuff in Delacourt motors keep leaving stuff on the pavement outside which is then being raided through and spread around the end of the road (sofa, bed head boards ends of carpet electrical goods). This has been ongoing for several months but it is becoming more frequent and now the items are bigger. In addition the residents of number 19 have dumped two very large palm trees outside on the footpath which have been there for 2 months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sun in the Sands Roundabout, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti tags, 21st June
item.description:
There are graffiti tags in black paint on every shutter of the Co-Op in the parade of shops near the junction with Days Lane. There is also green paint haphazardly sprayed on the utility box outside the Co-Op and also white paint sprayed on the white utility box outside the shops. This graffiti is unsightly please can it be removed ASAP as it brings the area down
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Halfway Street, Longlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very long grass and grass seed needs removing, 21st June
item.description:
Dogs are having to be operated on to remove grease seeds and burrs . They are extremely dangerous for dogs. This clearing of grass seed and mowing is now well overdue. This is a well used dog park by all of us local residents and is currently unsuitable for use. Weâ€™ pay you a fortune in council tax. Please fix as soon as possible and prioritise this.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanhope Grove, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Clean the street, 21st June
item.description:
There is human piss and shit everywhere in Goodwins Court and it hasnâ€™t been power washed in weeks. There are stains, smells and rubbish everywhere as you can see. You are supposed to wash the street weekly and clean it daily but the cleaners just walk around it. Sort this shit out once and for all

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Goodwins Court, Bloomsbury, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unauthorised sign, 21st June
item.description:
There is a Mosque sign attached to the reverse of a No entry sign. As local residents in St Georges Drive / Eccleston Square we don't want unauthorised signs being hung on the back of proper road signs. Can you remove it please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St George's Drive, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet
